title: Pitt CSC Hacks
tech: Typescript, Javascript, React, Express, Node, MongoDB
description: I created a full-stack application with two other students in a two week long hackathon. It streamlines the user experience of Pitt's CS Clubs internship repository which has over 15,000 stars.

title: PittBOT
description: Worked on the official bot for Pitt Residence Discord Servers. I more specifically focused on emoji synchronization between all residence hall servers with approval features for administrators.

title: Chess Game
description: Implementation of a game I am not very good at. I created the underlying pieces and check mate detection and legal move behavior. This was my first major personal project.

title: Best Neighborhood in Pittsburgh
description: An introduction to Data Analysis work in a team. We were tasked with finding the best neighborhood in Pittsburgh using open source Western Pennsylvania Regional Data Center data.
